comments.en:
The magicolor 2430 DL is a network color laser printer with a 2005 street price of $500 USD. This printer is supported by a free CUPS driver supplied by Konica Minolta and also by the "foo2zjs" free software printer driver. Note that the older Minolta magicolor 2430 DL and the newer Konica Minolta magicolor 2430 DL are not 100% equal. So it is not sure whether the Minolta magicolor 2430 DL perhaps also works with the driver from Konica Minolta.

Consumables/Refills:
Toner Black (4500 prints) - $79
Toner Yellow (4500 prints) - $119
Toner Magenta (4500 prints) - $119
Toner Cyan (4500 prints) - $119
Drum Catridge (45000 prints) - $149
Part numbers: 1710587-004, 1710587-005, 1710587-006, 1710587-007, 1710591-001
